mapper.select: SELECT ORG_SEQ as orgSeq, ORG_CD as orgCd, ORG_NM as orgNm, ORG_DIV_CD as orgDivCd, BIZ_NO as bizNo, CEO_NM as ceoNm, ORG_TELL_NO as orgTellNo, ORG_FAX_NO as orgFaxNo, ORG_ZIP as orgZip, ORG_ADDR1 as orgAddr1, ORG_ADDR2 as orgAddr2, ORG_SAIL_NM as orgSailNm, ORG_SAIL_PHONE as orgSailPhone, REG_ID as regId, REG_DT as regDt, CHG_ID as chgId, CHG_DT as chgDt FROM FL_ORG
